apps.name: Flycast
apps.subtitle: Dreamcast, Naomi and Atomiswave emulator.
apps.versionDescription: Full framebuffer emulation and texture upscaling on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: Flycast is a Dreamcast, Naomi, Naomi 2 and Atomiswave emulator.

screenshotURLs.name: Yattee
screenshotURLs.subtitle: Alternative YouTube frontend
screenshotURLs.versionDescription:
- Fixed reported crash
- Fixed issue where "Add to Playlist" window cannot be closed when there is no playlists
screenshotURLs.localizedDescription:
Alternative YouTube frontent for iOS, tvOS and macOS built with Invidious and Piped.
Features:
- Native user interface built with SwiftUI
- Multiple instances and accounts, fast switching
- SponsorBlock, configurable categories to skip
- Player queue and history
- Fullscreen playback, Picture in Picture and AirPlay support
- Stream quality selection
- Favorites: customizable section of channels, playlists, trending, searches and other views
